mapper.insert: insert into blacklist (ip, description, intercept_count, last_access_url, last_access_time, create_by, create_time) values (#{ip}, #{description}, #{interceptCount}, #{lastAccessUrl}, #{lastAccessTime}, #{createBy}, sysdate())
mapper.select:
select id, ip, description, intercept_count, last_access_url, last_access_time, create_by, create_time from blacklist where delete_time is null
AND ip like concat('%', #{ip}, '%')
AND description = #{description}
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
select id, ip, description, intercept_count, last_access_url, last_access_time, create_by, create_time from blacklist where id = ${id}
